text: Willy Kuijpers (1 January 1937 â€“ 17 November 2020) was a Belgian politician. He was born in Leuven, Belgium. He was a member of the People's Union Party and the New Flemish Alliance. Kuijpers was a member of the Chamber of Representatives from 1971 to 1984. He also was a MEP from 1984 to 1989. He was a Senator from 1989 to 1995. From 1995 to 2012, he was Mayor of Herent. Kuijpers died on 17 November 2020 at a hospital in Leuven from COVID-19 at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Belgian mayors Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Belgium Category:MEPs for Belgium Category:People from Leuven Category:Members of the Flemish Parliament
title: Willy Kuijpers
